price: et le soleil court vers un gîte qui lui est assigné; telle est la détermination du Tout-Puissant, de l’Omniscient.
arabic: وَٱلشَّمۡسُ تَجۡرِي لِمُسۡتَقَرّٖ لَّهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقۡدِيرُ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡعَلِيمِ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wal-shamsu tajrī limus'taqarrin lahā dhālika taqdīru al-ʿazīzi al-ʿalīmi
